entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
